extension.description: With this Add-on you can read your eMails from any IMAP-based Email Providers like GMail, Yahoo, AOL, iCloud and others.[CR]Current Features:[CR] -List Mailboxes with total/unseen status[CR] -Mark eMails as seen/unseen (via Context Menu)[CR] -Read (text based) eMails[CR] -Delete eMails (via Context Menu)
